import{connect}from'react-redux';import{MenuList}from'./MenuList';// Actions
import{startGame as _startGame}from'../../actions/gameLogActions';import{resetTextChoices as _resetTextChoices}from'../../actions/textActions';import{resetVariables as _resetVariables}from'../../actions/variablesActions';import{loadModuleData as _loadModuleData,setLoading as _setLoading}from'../../actions/dataActions';var mapStateToProps=function mapStateToProps(state){return{gameStarted:state.game.gameStarted,currentNodeKey:state.game.currentNodeKey};};var mapDispatchToProps=function mapDispatchToProps(dispatch){return{startGame:function startGame(){return dispatch(_startGame());},resetTextChoices:function resetTextChoices(){return dispatch(_resetTextChoices());},resetVariables:function resetVariables(){return dispatch(_resetVariables());},loadModuleData:function loadModuleData(moduleNumber){return dispatch(_loadModuleData(moduleNumber));},setLoading:function setLoading(loading){return dispatch(_setLoading(loading));}};};export default connect(mapStateToProps,mapDispatchToProps)(MenuList);
